text: A viral Instagram post claims President Joe Biden defunded historically black colleges and universities (HBCUs) by $30 billion, whereas former President Donald Trump permanently funded them.
An image shared on Facebook claims President Joe Biden canceled $250 million in funding that former President Donald Trump gave to historically black colleges and universities (HBCUs).
